messages.subject: Samurai History Forum- RT Chat
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone who doesn t know, there is a forum also associated with this group: http://forums.delphiforums.com/samuraihistory/ Recently a real time chat
messages.messageBody:
For anyone who doesn't know, there is a forum also associated with
this group: http://forums.delphiforums.com/samuraihistory/

Recently a 'real time chat' feature has been added, so anyone
interested, sign up and log in. People randomly check the chat room
throughout the day and night.
It is a delphi forum, so there is no charge and a simple sign up
process.
